name: Hollow Stars - MVM19 Entry
description:
Controls

Movement: Arrow Keys

Jump: Space

Dash: Shift

Shooting Star: X

Map: Tab

Menu: Escape

My Thoughts

My thoughts aren't necessarily the most thrilling, but I just wanted to do a reflection on the game jam. It's been awhile since I participated in a jam (June 2022, also MVM) and during that jam, near the end, the files for my project got wiped, I'm still unsure what happened, and the project didn't work after a month of me making it. For awhile, it really discouraged me in regards to game development.

This time, I joined, and though I didn't quite get my game to where I wanted it, I was able to publish a working project that is (hopefully) aesthetically pleasing at the very least. I don't mind whatever place I get in this game jam, I'm simply happy to be back on my feet with dev work again.

I wish everyone else who joined luck and want to thank Falcon Nova, the jam's host, for this opportunity!

Credits

Music by Chan Mrotzek

Art by Lucky Clover Dev

Programming by Lucky Clover Dev

Lets just assume everything that isn't music was done by Lucky Clover Dev, to save space.
